Package ch.konnexions.db_seeder.utils

Class Config

java.lang.Object
ch.konnexions.db_seeder.utils.Config
public final class Config
extends java.lang.Object
The configuration parameters for the supported database management systems. The configuration parameters are made available to the configuration object in a text file. The parameter name and parameter value must be separated by an equal sign (=).

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Config()
    Initialises a new configuration object.
